body: I'm following Mostapha's tutorial on creating ladybug component: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3YijEmhzCs&list=PLkjfDmSc5Orxq...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3YijEmhzCs&list=PLkjfDmSc5Orxq-f_fbmu_HV4tE2ZPIdaC&index=3) But I have the following two problems: 1. In the end the cloudiness data can be extracted from a weather file, but it can't be visualized by the 3D Chart component 2. when the "out" output variable is removed, there is no output at all from the "cloudiness" output variable. Am I missing sth in the python code? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lihD20i2jrz4ouZmVoH4SYq1SvrGV1wbSuyX8sFxJ2oicgXMy297zGIJbslNDpriAKPatClxyvhZFORXVpWdpVhqbCpek16V/Capture.PNG)
